# 斯坦福 CS231n 卷积神经网络课程笔记翻译

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/sitanfu-cs231n-juanji-shenjingwangluo-kecheng-biji-fanyi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/sitanfu-cs231n-juanji-shenjingwangluo-kecheng-biji-fanyi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install sitanfu-cs231n-juanji-shenjingwangluo-kecheng-biji-fanyi
sitanfu-cs231n-juanji-shenjingwangluo-kecheng-biji-fanyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g sitanfu-csersanyin-juanji-shenjingwangluo-kecheng-biji-fanyi
sitanfu-csersanyin-juanji-shenjingwangluo-kecheng-biji-fanyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
